content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: ConnectScopeToOrigin path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/delivery/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/sites/{site_id}/scopes/{scope_id}/origins content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name siteid
desc a site id
in path
required true
schema
type str
name scopeid
desc a scope id
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum connect an origin to a scope
desc the origin is automatically created if necessary when the request contains a priority which an origin already associated with the scope has set the existing origin is disconnected the priority of an origin already associated with a scope can be modified via this endpoint
reqbody
deliveryconnectscopetooriginrequest

desc the origins http request hostname

format int32
desc the origins http request port

set this to 0 to remove this value

type integer
format int32
desc the origins https request port

set this to 0 to remove this value

deliverygooglestorageorigin
type obj
bucketname
type str
desc the origin buckets name
desc a google storage bucket origin
desc a new origin
priority
type integer
format int32
desc the origins priority to the scope

if more than one origin powers a cdn scope then the one with the lower priority number takes higher precedence when there is an origin already in place the following rules are followed

 if an origin id is provided then the current origin at that priority is disconnected in favor of the new one
 if an origin is provided and the current origin at the given priority is dedicated then the origin is updated in place
 if an origin is provided and no dedicated origin exists the origin is created and connected to the scope
originid
type str
desc the id of an existing origin to associate with a scope

this is useful for connecting to a shared origin
required true
responses
200
deliveryconnectscopetooriginresponse
type obj
deliveryscopeorigin
type obj
props
priority
type integer
format int32
desc an origins priority to its site scope

if a cdn scope is powered by more than one origin then the one with the lower priority number takes higher precedence
schemadeliveryorigin
type obj
props
id
type str
desc an origins unique identifier
stackid
type str
desc the stack for which the origin belongs to
dedicated
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not an origin is dedicated to a cdn site

dedicated origins cannot be used by any site other than that to which it is dedicated
siteid
type str
desc the id of the cdn site to which an origin is dedicated
